snippet.title: Galactic Civilizations IV: Supernova - The Lore of Galactic Civilizations
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now: http://steam.gs/l/pb1sn/loreofgalciv

Embark on a thrilling journey through Galactic Civilizations, a 4X game that weaves a mesmerizing story of ancient empires, betrayal, and galactic strife. Uncover the secrets of the cunning Drengin and the honorable Arceans, while witnessing the ominous emergence of the dark Yor.

00:00 Intro
01:05 Arceans and Drengin
03:06 The Precursors
05:15 Hyperdrive
08:45 Crusade
10:37 The Dread Lords
14:20 The Story Continues

--- 
Galactic Civilizations IV:
Website - https://www.galciv4.com/
Discord - https://discord.gg/galciv
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/GalCiv/
Twitter - http://twitter.com/galciv
Reddit -  https://www.reddit.com/r/GalCiv/
